Class HeaterController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emse.spring.faircorp.api.HeaterController

@RestController

extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for defining Heater controller logics

        Gets all the heaters of specific room
        Parameters:

      • switchStatus

        @PutMapping(path="/{heater_id}/switch")
public HeaterDto switchStatus​(@PathVariable
                              java.lang.Long heater_id)
        Put request to switch heater status on or off
        Parameters:
        heater_id - provided to switch on or off the specified heater
        Returns:
        new heater switch status

      • create

        @PostMapping
public HeaterDto create​(@RequestBody
                        HeaterDto dto)
        Post request to create new heater or to update heater
        Parameters:
        dto - contains heater name, switch status, power and room object
        Returns:
        new heater if heater id is not provided otherwise updates heater with provided heater id

      • delete

        @DeleteMapping(path="/{heater_id}")
public void delete​(@PathVariable
                   java.lang.Long heater_id)
        Delete heater Deletes specific heater with provided heater id. Heater with all its content inside.
        Parameters:
        heater_id - delete heater by heater id
